Navigator.description:
Expert in charting courses through unknown space and navigating dangerous stellar phenomena.

Navigators possess a **third eye** that allows them to *perceive the warp* and guide ships through the immaterium.

Mech Adept.description: Mechanical genius skilled in engineering, robotics, and maintaining critical ship systems.

Lord Commander.description: Natural leader who inspires the crew and makes crucial tactical decisions in combat and crisis.

Everyone.description: Universal moves available to all characters.
